mng: beautiful sound, appeal, charm, vowel, rhyme, in Chinese phonetics, the medial and final sound of a syllable (i.e. excluding the initial consonant)

exm.mng: cadence, rhythm, rhyme scheme, meter (in verse)
implicit charm in rhyme or sound, hinted appeal, interest
charm or grace (in poetry or art)
music, rhyme and rhythm, initial, 音[yin1], and final and tone, 韻|韵[yun4], of a Chinese character, phoneme
poetic occasion, elegant situation, in literature, the cue for a poem
to rhyme, sometimes written 壓韻|压韵
poetic and passionate (idiom); romance, love affair
